subject: Football
College Athletics
Heisman Trophy
lead_paragraph: Florida’s Tim Tebow has spent dozens of hours a week to prepare for the 1.3 seconds it takes for the quarterback to make a decision after a snap. And he’s a stand-out student.
snippet: Florida’s Tim Tebow has spent dozens of hours a week to prepare for the 1.3 seconds it takes for the quarterback to make a decision after a snap. And he’s a stand-out student.
